verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Be fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and replenish <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the fear <S%H4172><s%> of you and the dread <S%H2844><s%> of you shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> upon all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> moveth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth, <S%H127><s%> and upon all <S%H3605><s%> the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> are they delivered. <S%H5414><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> moving thing <S%H7431><s%> that <S%H834><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> meat <S%H402><s%> for you; even as the green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> all things. <S%H3605><s%>
But <S%H389><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the life <S%H5315><s%> thereof, which is the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof, shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> eat. <S%H398><s%>

And surely <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> your blood <S%H1818><s%> of your lives <S%H5315><s%> will I require; <S%H1875><s%> at the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> it, and at the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of man; <S%H120><s%> at the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of every man's <S%H376><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H853><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>

Whoso sheddeth <S%H8210><s%> man's <S%H120><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> by man <S%H120><s%> shall his blood <S%H1818><s%> be shed: <S%H8210><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in the image <S%H6754><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he <S%H853><s%> man. <S%H120><s%>
And you, <S%H859><s%> be ye fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply; <S%H7235><s%> bring forth abundantly <S%H8317><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> therein.
And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%>
And I, <S%H589><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you, and with <S%H854><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you;

And with <S%H854><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> you, of the fowl, <S%H5775><s%> of the cattle, <S%H929><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you; from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that go out <S%H3318><s%> of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you; neither <S%H3808><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> by the waters <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4325><s%> of a flood; <S%H3999><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there any more <S%H5750><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> you, for perpetual <S%H5769><s%> generations: <S%H1755><s%>

I do set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my bow <S%H7198><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> for a token <S%H226><s%> of a covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when I bring <S%H6049><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> that the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud: <S%H6051><s%>

And I will remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> me and you and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

And the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the cloud; <S%H6051><s%> and I will look upon <S%H7200><s%> it, that I may remember <S%H2142><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have established <S%H6965><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah, <S%H5146><s%> that went forth <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> Shem, <S%H8035><s%> and Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth: <S%H3315><s%> and Ham <S%H2526><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah: <S%H5146><s%> and of them <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%> was the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> overspread. <S%H5310><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to be an husbandman, <S%H376><s%> <S%H127><s%> and he planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard: <S%H3754><s%>
And he drank <S%H8354><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the wine, <S%H3196><s%> and was drunken; <S%H7937><s%> and he was uncovered <S%H1540><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> his tent. <S%H168><s%>

And Ham, <S%H2526><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> without. <S%H2351><s%>

And Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Japheth <S%H3315><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a garment, <S%H8071><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> their shoulders, <S%H7926><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> backward, <S%H322><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of their father; <S%H1><s%> and their faces <S%H6440><s%> were backward, <S%H322><s%> and they saw <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> their father's <S%H1><s%> nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> from his wine, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3196><s%> and knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> his younger <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> unto him.
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> be Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> of servants <S%H5650><s%> shall he be <S%H1961><s%> unto his brethren. <S%H251><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Shem; <S%H8035><s%> and Canaan <S%H3667><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his servant. <S%H5650><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> shall enlarge <S%H6601><s%> Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> and he shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Shem; <S%H8035><s%> and Canaan <S%H3667><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his servant. <S%H5650><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
